v.v: Yahweh, you have examined what is in my inner being,
You know when I sit down and when I stand up.
From the time that I rise in the morning until I lie down to sleep at night,
Yahweh, even before I say anything,
You protect me on all sides;
I am not able to understand that you know everything about me.
Where could I go to escape from your Spirit?
If I go up to heaven, you will be there.
If the sun could carry me across the sky,
you would be there also to lead me by your hand,
I could wish for the darkness to hide me,
But even if that happened, you would still see me.
You created all the parts of my body;
I praise you because you made my body very awesomely and wonderfully.
When my body was being formed,
You saw me before I was born.
God, what you think about me is very valuable.
If I could count them, I would see that they are more than the grains of sand at the seashore.
God, I wish that you would kill the wicked people!
They say wicked things about you;
Yahweh, I certainly hate those who hate you!
I hate them completely,
God, search my inner being;
Find out whether there is anything evil in my inner being,

v: and you know everything about me.
Even though you are far away from me,
you know what I am thinking.
you know everything that I do.
you know everything that I am going to say!
you put your hand on me to protect me with your power.
That is too hard for me to really understand.
Where could I go to get away from you?
If I lie down in the place where the dead people are, you will be there.
if I flew west and made a place to live on an island in the ocean,
and you would help me.
or I could wish for the light around me to become darkness.
For you the night is as bright as the daytime,
because daylight and darkness are no different to you.
you put the parts of my body together when I was still in my motherâ€™s womb.
Everything that you do is amazing!
I certainly know that very well.
while it was being put together where no one else could see it,
you saw it!
You wrote in your book the number of days that you had decided that I would live.
You did that before any of those days had even started!
There are a huge amount of things that you think about.
When I awake, I am still with you.
I wish that violent men would all leave me.
they slander your name.
I despise those who rebel against you.
and I consider that they are my enemies.
find out what I am thinking!
and lead me along the road that leads to my being with you forever.
